title: Fort Frederica National Monument: Calendar
body: Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 8 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Fort Frederica National Monument Film: History Uncovered      Time: 9:00 AM to 4:30 PM Location: Visitor Center Theatre Fees: free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 07/25/2016 to 08/19/2017 23 minute film showing how archeological discoveries have revealed a clearer picture of Frederica's history.  Shown on the hour and half hour. View Details      Fort Frederica National Monument Frederica Self-Guided Walking Tours      Time: 9:00 AM to 4:30 PM Location: Starts in Visitor Center Fees: free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 07/25/2016 to 07/14/2017 Let your cell phone be your guide with an audio tour, accessible by dialing or scanning a QR code.  Information and assistance available in Visitor Center. View Details      Fort Frederica National Monument Walk with a Ranger      Time: 1:00 PM Location: Starts in Visitor Center Fees: free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Learn what archeological research has revealed about the 18th century British Settlement as well as other time periods. View Details      Fort Frederica National Monument Museum Tour      Location: Visitor Center Fees: free     Monday, August 15, 2016 Held at 10:00 am, 12:00 pm, 2:00 pm, and 4:00 pm.  A Ranger will use the artifacts and displays in the Museum to give "The Rest of the Story" of Frederica. View Details      Fort Frederica National Monument Spanish Moss Program      Time: 11:00 AM to 12:00 PM Location: Meet Ranger at Visitor Center Fees: free     Wednesday, August 17, 2016 Today Spanish Moss is used in decorative crafts, but for the Natives and English settlers it was an important crop with many uses.  Join a Ranger and learn the history View Details      Fort Frederica National Monument Tyme In The Garden      Time: 10:00 AM to 11:00 AM Location: Garden behind the Visitor Center Fees: free     Friday, August 19, 2016 Take a guided tour through our garden, and learn about the plants and herbs used by the people of Frederica. View Details      Fort Frederica National Monument Colonial Foodways      Time: 1:00 PM to 3:00 PM,10:00 AM to 12:00 PM Location: Behind Visitor Center Fees: free     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Every Saturday Weekly  from 07/30/2016 to 08/20/2016 Colonial Cooking Demonstration View Details      Fort Frederica National Monument National Park Service 100th Birthday Celebration      Time: 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM Location: Throughout Park Fees: Free     Saturday, August 27, 2016 Frederica's Living History Festival.  Cannon will fire once again at Frederica to celebrate the 100th birthday of the National Park Service. View Details
